play.intro: This the tournament page. You can enter the tournament and watch the players list until it's started. Then you can go back here to report your games and look at the tournament status.

register.noPlayers: No registered players at the moment

errors.noDuplicateNick: A player with that name is already registered
errors.registrationLocked: You can't enter this tournament, registration is locked
errors.noSuchTournament: No such tournament has been registered, check your URL or go back to the main page to create a new tournament.

report.fail: An error occurred when reporting match
report.description: Report a match you played for this tournament

play.notFound: No such tournament seems to exist, are you sure it's the right URL ?
